Project.name: Employee Admin Demo for Silverlight
Project.Description: This demo illustrates techniques for performing routine UI operations in a PureMVC-based Silverlight application.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Changes in Version 1.1.3
  • First public release on puremvc.org
  • Add support for Visual Studio 2010 final and Silverlight 4 Toolkit final versions
Changes in Version 1.1.2
  • Fixes the title of the application in the application control bar
Changes in Version 1.1.1
  • Fixes some bugs in the user form panel when displaying the top right user informations label
Changes in Version 1.1
  • Updated version to follow the design and code conventions from PureMVC AS3 EmployeeAdmin Demo 2.0.4
Features in Version 1.0
  • First public release on tekool.net
  • This demo was ported from the original PureMVC AS3 Flex/WebOrb Login Demo
  • Port of the classic AS3 Employee Admin demo
Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a EmployeeAdmin_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\EmployeeAdmin_X_Y
